title: notocactus
author: notocactus
content: This website is cool for newbies who want to get different information about Ethereum network, its ecosystem, exclusively gas for transactions. It is helpful to give you overview about the past, current and projection for future from which you can make your own plans if you are an Ethereum investor.Website: https://ultrasound.money/Get some main categoriesSupply GrowthSupply ProjectionsThe burnTotal Value Secured - TVSMonetary PremiumQ & AAs you can see from following screenshots, lots of information is given on that website. For newbies, they can start with Gas that is helpful for their on-chain transactions. For investors, pay attention on Supply Growth, Supply Projections and The burn. If you want to explore more about Ethereum ecosystem, check at Total Value Secured - TVS and Monetary Premium.
